### Roofing and Gutters

| Task | Explanation | Risk Lowered | Importance (1-10) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Roof Inspection | Visually inspect the roof for damaged, missing, or loose shingles, and repair or replace as needed. | Water damage, structural damage | 9 |
| Gutter Cleaning | Clean leaves and debris from gutters and downspouts to ensure proper water flow. | Water damage, foundation damage | 8 |
| Gutter Guard Installation | Install gutter guards to prevent debris accumulation and reduce gutter cleaning frequency. | Water damage, foundation damage | 6 |
| Downspout Extension | Install or adjust downspout extensions to direct water at least 3-4 feet away from the foundation. | Foundation damage | 7 |
| Flashing Inspection | Check roof flashing for damage, rust, or gaps, and repair or replace as needed. | Water damage, structural damage | 8 |
| Gutter Inspection | Inspect gutters for damage or sagging, and repair or replace as needed. | Water damage, foundation damage | 7 |
| Roof Ventilation | Ensure proper roof ventilation to prevent ice dams and improve energy efficiency. | Ice dams, energy waste | 7 |
| Tree Trimming | Trim tree branches that are close to or overhanging the roof. | Roof damage, gutter clogging | 6 |
| Roof Debris Removal | Remove debris, such as branches or leaves, from the roof surface. | Roof damage, water damage | 5 |
| Chimney Inspection | Inspect and clean the chimney to ensure proper function and prevent damage. | Fire risk, structural damage | 8 |

### Plumbing

| Task | Explanation | Risk Lowered | Importance (1-10) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Pipe Insulation | Insulate exposed pipes in unheated areas to prevent freezing and bursting. | Water damage, pipe damage | 8 |
| Leak Detection | Check for leaks around faucets, toilets, and under sinks, and repair as needed. | Water damage, mold growth | 9 |
| Water Heater Inspection | Inspect and maintain the water heater, including checking the pressure relief valve and draining sediment. | Water damage, energy waste | 7 |
| Sump Pump Inspection | Inspect and test the sump pump to ensure proper function during heavy rainfall. | Water damage, basement flooding | 8 |
| Main Water Valve | Locate and test the main water shut-off valve to ensure it works in case of an emergency. | Water damage, pipe damage | 6 |
| Hose Replacement | Replace washing machine and dishwasher hoses every 5-7 years to prevent leaks and bursts. | Water damage, appliance damage | 7 |
| Drain Maintenance | Clear slow drains and clean drain traps to prevent clogs and backups. | Water damage, pipe damage | 7 |
| Septic System Inspection | Inspect and pump the septic system as recommended to prevent backups and failures. | Environmental damage, health risks | 8 |
| Outdoor Faucet Winterization | Disconnect and drain hoses, and winterize outdoor faucets to prevent freezing. | Pipe damage, water damage | 7 |
| Appliance Inspection | Check appliances, such as dishwashers and refrigerators, for leaks and proper function. | Water damage, appliance damage | 6 |
